meta_description: Explore exhibitions, events, and art classes at Erie Art Museum. Discover inspiring artwork and cultural programs in Erie, Pennsylvania.
hours_text:
# Visitor Information

## Admission

Members - Free  
Adults - $10  
Senior Citizens & Students - $8  
16-years-old and under - Free

The Erie Art Museum offers free admission to active-duty military members. Please present military ID to redeem this discount.

For Individuals and families with an ACCESS EBT card, entry fee is just $2 per person (up to four people). Please present photo ID with your access card to receive the discount.

[ ]()

[ ]()

20 E 5th St., Erie, PA 16507  
Entrance between State Street and French Street

Current Hours

Wednesday, 11 am – 6 pm  
Thursday, 11 am – 6 pm  
Friday, 11 am – 6 pm  
Saturday, 10 am – 5 pm  
Sunday, 1 – 6 pm  
Closed Monday – Tuesday

Special Hours & Closings

April 5th | Museum Closed

## Museum Partnerships

Students, Faculty, and Staff of [Gannon University](https://www.gannon.edu/) and [Lake Erie College of Osteopathic Medicine (LECOM)](https://lecom.edu) get free admission to the Museum! Please bring your staff or student ID with you to redeem this discount. 

[ ]()

[ ]()

## Parking Information & Downtown Parking Guide Map

Metered Street parking is available on State Street and around Perry Square along North and South Park Row, French Street, and Peach Street. These parking options have easy access to the Museum from the west side of the entrance. Meters can be fed using quarters or via the [MeterEZ app](https://www.meterez.com/). 

[ ](https://www.meterez.com)

[ ](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/meterez/id1357663198)
...

## Preserving History

Work on the historic Customs House is underway. This project aims to enhance the exterior envelope of the building to mitigate water infiltration at the ground level.

[ Learn more ](/press/customs-house-preservation-1)
